include_directories(../../include)

if (${ARCH} STREQUAL "x86_64")
  set(
    RC4_ARCH_SOURCES

    rc4-x86_64.${ASM_EXT}
  )
endif()

if (${ARCH} STREQUAL "x86")
  set(
    RC4_ARCH_SOURCES

    rc4-586.${ASM_EXT}
  )
endif()

add_library(
  rc4

  OBJECT

  rc4.c
  ${RC4_ARCH_SOURCES}
)

perlasm(rc4-x86_64.${ASM_EXT} asm/rc4-x86_64.pl)
perlasm(rc4-586.${ASM_EXT} asm/rc4-586.pl)
